title: FPS drops since 7.4
body:
after 7.4 i get FPS drops everytime my team is winning, we have more minions than the enemy on the map, this become worse if we get baron buff

however it doesnt happen the other way around, enemy has more minions than my team, i can play perfectly fine when this happens, when we are losing but get FPS drops when we are winning, how can i fix this? is this some kind of bug? does riot has this adressed? i have seen a similar scenario on reddit but couldnt find a solution 

i have tried everything in the support section (except formating) and yes im playing in a potato, but i have been playing with it perfectly fine for 2 years until 7.4 

can a rioter give more insight on whats going on and how to fix it?

replies.body:
It sounds like your pc might just be having a hard time handling your OP skills on the Rift XD.

Jokes aside, what seems to be happening is this: when you're winning, there are more minions on the screen and your pc has to be able to render everything going on at once. If you have all three lanes pushed to enemy towers, there is a lot more action going on than when the enemy team is winning (that YOU can see due to fog of war). 

It's because of this that your pc is slowing down 'when you're winning'. Be sure to check out our [**minimum specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) to see if your pc is up to par.

Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys might be able to work something out.

then why it doesnt happen when im losing? even if its the same amount or bigger but still no FPS drops 

and why it only started to happen after 7.4 patch 

before 7.4 i could have twice the amount of allied minions and play completely fine

When you're losing, the fog of war prevents you from seeing everything (when you're winning your minion vision lets you see much more). That could be the cause of those fps drops. If your pc meets the minimum specs, try the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to see if we can smooth out those frames. If that doesn't seem to help, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work through this with you one on one.
